about_the_game:
A Light Jog is a casual runner game that ends once the player hits a hazard. It is an endless runner that tracks how long you the player last in seconds.

With 4 different locations and music going to mediocre at best (featuring a volume slider), the player has multiple places to travel through and a music system that would play a random track for each place. Each area has at least one exclusive track while other tracks would be featured in another or all other locations.

There are eleven different hazards players must avoid on their jog as the game progresses. Some hazards would be exclusive to certain areas while others may be seen in other areas or all areas, similar to the music tracks.

Consistency is kind of boring as players won't travel to the same order of places, face the same kind of hazard pattern, or hear the same kind of tracks in each run. Music tracks are randomly picked through a small selection as the level starts and some unique hazards may appear during sometime later in the run.

Jump, slide, and take your time.

name: A Light Jog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Current supported Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Unless the processor is quite strong, a cheap graphics card if needed
  • Storage: 125 MB available space

short_description: A Light Jog is a 2D endless runner game with 4 different places to travel through as you, the player, jog as long as you can while passing hazards that could stop you.
